name: Forest Gnome
description: As a forest gnome, you have a natural knack for illusion and an inherent connection to small beasts.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Gnomish Cunning
traits.description: You have advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

features.name: Gnomish Lineage
features.description: You know the Minor Illusion cantrip. You always have Speak with Animals prepared and can cast it without a spell slot a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus per Long Rest. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability.

list.name: Minor Illusion
list.description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for 1 minute. The illusion ends if you dismiss it or cast this spell again.
